document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 12/10/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (12/10/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Nouveau contenu PlayStation Plus 20% de réduction sur tous les nouveaux thèmes The Studio 25% de réduction sur Resident Evil 5 Gold Edition pendant une semaine seulement 20% de réduction sur Renegade Ops pendant deux semaines seulement Sélection d’offres spéciales PS3 Call of Duty Classic (Prix initial 14.99 € – Maintenant 7.99 €) Call of Duty 4 Variety – Map Pack (Prix initial 9.99 € – Maintenant 3.99/€4.99 €) Call of Duty: World at War – Map Pack 1 (Prix initial 9.99 € – Maintenant 4.99 €) Call of Duty: World at War – Map Pack 2 (Prix initial 9.99 € – Maintenant 4.99 €) Call of Duty: World at War – Map Pack 3 (Prix initial 9.99 € – Maintenant 4.99 €) Call of Duty: World at War – Map Pack Bundle (Prix initial 24.99 € – Maintenant 12.99 €) Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 – Stimulus Package (Prix initial 13.99 € – Maintenant 6.99 €) Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 – Resurgence Package (Prix initial 13.99 € – Maintenant 6.99 €) Ces offres se terminent le 19 octobre 2011 Nouveau contenu PlayStation Network Essais et déblocages (PS3) Castlevania: Harmony Of Despair (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Real Steel (6.29 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Sideway: New York Trial (9.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Jeux complets (PS3) Bolt (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Resident Evil 5 Gold Edition (19.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine (69.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Démo (PS3) DanceStar Party Demo Rating: PEGI 12 Ajouts de jeu et contenus (PS3) Ace Combat Assault Horizon Rating: PEGI 16 Acah F-4E (Limited Edition) (gratuit) Compatibility Pack 1 (gratuit) Skill Pack 1 – Mg Cool Down+ (1.99 €) Skill Pack 2 – Enhanced Dfm+ (1.99 €) Skill Pack 3 – Enhanced Asm+ (1.99 €) Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer – Special Pack (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Dragon Age 2 – Mark of the Assassin (9.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Dynasty Warriors 7 Rating: PEGI 16 Costume Pack 4 (0.99 €) New Stage & Bgm Pack 3 (2.99 €) Stage Pack 4 (3.99 €) Duke Nukem Forever – Hail to the Icons Parody Pack (7.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 LittleBigPlanet2 Rating: PEGI 7 Weekend Pursuits Costume Kit (2.99 €) (Inclut le contenu suivant disponible à l’unité) Skier Costume (0.99 €) Angler Costume (0.99 €) Caver Costume (0.99 €) Golfer Costume (0.99 €) Resistance 3 – Survival Pack (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Rock Band Network Rating: PEGI 12 – Disponibilité: non disponible au Luxembourg Alaska (2X Bass Pedal) – Between the Buried and Me (1.49 €) City Of Corruption (2X Bass Pedal) – Amberian Dawn (1.49 €) City Of Corruption – Amberian Dawn (1.49 €) Doppelgänger – Freezepop (0.79 €) Morte Et Dabo (2X Bass Pedal) – Asking Alexandria (1.49 €) Soy Bomb – Honest Bob and the Factory-to-Dealer Incentives (0.79 €) The Space For This (2X Bass Pedal) – Cynic (1.49 €) The Space For This – Cynic (1.49 €) Your Troubles Will Cease And Fortune Will Smile Upon You – After the Burial (1.49 €) Your Troubles Will Cease And Fortune Will Smile Upon You (2X Bass Pedal) – After the Burial (1.49 €) Avatars Tomb Raider Anniversary Ces avatars sont disponibles à l’unité au prix de 0.25 € Lara Croft #1 Lara Croft #2 Lara Croft #3 Lara Croft #4 Lara Croft #5 Lara Croft #6 Lara Croft Rochard Skyrig Theme (gratuit) Nature Virtual Landscapes (1.49 €) Lieu/Monument Flying Tiger Themes – Frisco Sunsets (1.99 €) Thèmes dynamiques (PS3) Abstraits 3D City (1.99 €) Blue Lasers (1.99 €) (1.99 €) Natures Great Life Theme (1.99 €) Secret Pond Theme (1.99 €) Relaxing Street Theme (1.99 €) Volcano And Lighting Theme (1.99 €) Fonds d’écran (PS3) Dd Heroes Wallpaper (gratuit) Rochard Wallpaper 1 (gratuit) Rochard Wallpaper 2 (gratuit) Sideways New York Wallpaper 1 (gratuit) Sideways New York Wallpaper 2 (gratuit) Sideways New York Wallpaper 3 (gratuit) Sideways New York Wallpaper 4 (gratuit) Vidéos (PS3) Access TV – Episode 004 Free Realms Trailer Real Steel – Promoted Trailer Sonic Generations Megadrive Era Trailer Sideway: New York Trailer (SOE)
Cette semaine, découvrez Castlevania: Harmony Of Despair qui comme tout Castlevania, a l’air plutôt bien, mais je vais attendre mon tour car j’ai déjà pas mal de jeu en cours, comme notammenet FIFA 12 ou Rocketbirds : Hardboiled Chicken qui sort la semaine prochaine.
